channel.title: Crafting guild miner?
channel.description:
So, I got idea : Crafting guild miner !
Like it would go there, mine full load of silver/gold/clay, and then banks and repeats. I'm sure many people would like this since crafting is pain in the ass, and so is mining silver :)
